meanings.definition: A group of emulsifiers used in food and cosmetic products.
meanings.sent1: The polysorbates in the lotion help keep the ingredients mixed together.
meanings.sent2: Food manufacturers often use polysorbates to blend oil and water in products.
meanings.sent3: The polysorbates at the party made sure the salad dressing stayed well mixed.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to blend in any situation was like the polysorbates in a smoothie.
meanings.sent5: The polysorbates acted like tiny mixers, ensuring the lotion stayed smooth and creamy.

meanings.definition: To mix or blend ingredients together using polysorbates.
meanings.sent1: I will polysorbate the oil and vinegar to make the salad dressing.
meanings.sent2: She polysorbates the ingredients to create a perfectly emulsified product.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to polysorbate the batter with care and precision.
meanings.sent4: As the storm approached, the wind seemed to polysorbate the leaves in the air.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brush polysorbated colors on the canvas, creating a beautiful masterpiece.
